answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!There are two possibilities. One is that the infection caused regional lymph nodes to swell. The other is that abscess or localized collection of pus has come up. The reason this is not healing could be due to the fact that you have diabetes or concomitant fungal or bacterial infection. Please consult a doctor as this has probably gone beyond the stage where you could treat at home. You may need local and oral antibacterials and anti inflammatory drugs. Also if there is an abscess, it will need to be drained.Hope this helps. Take care!

question: So, this is what happen to me. I was cutting my pbubic hairs on my sack with a razor and i cut myself pretty bad,and it's been about two and half weeks now and its still not healling all of that well!now i woke up in pain this morning and now i have two lumps on either side of my groin that are hard and very sore!does anyone know what this is? and what can i do for it ?please help
title: sore, lumps
